job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing high-quality applications. They will also be responsible for designing and implementing testable and scalable code.&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><p>Experience Band 5-10 years (Software Engineers)</p><ul><li>Extremely proficient in Embedded C, bare metal device driver development, board bring up and BSP/low level (closer to hardware) platform software development</li><li>Expertise in BSP and drivers for at least one or more of the following - PCIe/USB/UFS/NAND (Exposure to Linux drivers is nice to have but not mandatory)</li><li>Beyond the driver software a deep protocol level understanding of one or more of the following (USB/UFS/PCIe) is expected</li><li>Good knowledge on Microprocessors/Microcontrollers - ARM MPU (ARMv7/ARMv8) architectures</li><li>Should have experience in Linux Internals or RTOS, IPC (Message Queues, Shared memory, Semaphores), multithreading, Mutex, etc)</li><li>Familiarity with Open source Linux Kernel and development practices.</li><li>Hands on experience with lab instruments like oscilloscopes, waveforms analyzers, Lauterbach(JTAG) is a plus</li><li>A self-managed individual with excellent problem-solving skills.</li></ul>
